ISSUE.TITLE: [bug]: Unable to create workspace on onboarding.
ISSUE.DESCRIPTION: ### Is there an existing issue for this? - [X] I have searched the existing issues ### Current behavior ![image](https://github.com/makeplane/plane/assets/30550632/035ef04e-4431-4361-bf51-523754a66f44) problem is in WorkSpaceViewSet create method. ### Steps to reproduce Run docker compose up. Open localhost/sign-up Add workspace Shows error. ### Browser Google Chrome ### Version Local - Self hosted - master branch
